price: 25. Loba; bokotunama te na mabe oyo tosali, mpe tokotunama te na misala na bino.
arabic: قُل لَّا تُسۡـَٔلُونَ عَمَّآ أَجۡرَمۡنَا وَلَا نُسۡـَٔلُ عَمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qul lā tus'alūna ʿammā ajramnā walā nus'alu ʿammā taʿmalūna
